name: Zen Mode
summary: When Darmanitan's HP drops to below half, it will turn into Darmanitan-Zen Mode.
viability: Darmanitan is pretty frail, so chances are you won't be turning into Darmanitan-Zen before you faint. Also, since the HP is so low, Darmanitan-Zen doesn't have a good defensive typing, and as such will not be able to tank a hit before going for Rest. Stick to Sheer Force.
